name: NP Istanbul Brain Hospital
description: Recognized as No.2 Brain Hospital in Europe, the facility excels in offering comprehensive Autism treatments. Therapies include thought-focused medicines and measurements of brain functions to manage Autism spectrum disorders. Dr. Sermin Kesebir , with 25+ years of experience, specializes in psychotherapy and psychiatric diseases. Dr. Kesebir's publications in peer-reviewed journals reflect his expertise in psych neurophysiology and psychoanalytically oriented psychotherapies. The clinic's quality services are affirmed by certifications like ISO and accreditation by TÜV NORD CERT.

name: Memorial Şişli Hospital
description: JCI accreditation as the first hospital in Turkey ensures high-quality Autism treatment standards. Offers psychotherapy and ABA therapy for autism with experienced professionals. Internationally trained doctors practice in top centers in Europe and the USA, enhancing Autism care. Comprehensive support for international patients, including language assistance and medical interpreters. Convenient location in Istanbul's city center, 28 km from Istanbul Ataturk International Airport.

name: Liv Hospital Ulus
description: Accredited by the Joint Commission International, ensuring high standards in autism treatment and comprehensive patient care. Offers stem cell therapy as a treatment option for autism, providing innovative and effective approaches. Hosts over 50 specialized clinics, enhancing multidisciplinary collaboration for autism treatment. Located 30 minutes from Istanbul Airport, provides easy access for international autism patients. Annually attracts 50,000 international patients, indicating trust and recognition in autism care.

name: Stem Solutions
description: Renowned for specializing in regenerative medicine with a focus on autism, offering personalized stem cell therapy treatments. Offers advanced stem cell therapy targeting autism, promoting recovery at the cellular level. Uses ultrasound-guided techniques, enhancing precision and effectiveness in autism treatment. Serves a diverse international patient base, including patients from the USA, Canada, and Europe. Committed to natural, minimally invasive interventions that improve quality of life and recovery.

name: Giostar Stem Cell Therapy | Cancun Clinic
description: Over 20 years of pioneering stem cell research, leading to significant advancements in autism treatment. Personalized stem cell therapy protocols tailored to enhance the body's natural healing processes for autism. Clinic serves both children and adults, attracting patients from the USA and Canada for autism care. Renowned team of visionary scientists and clinicians specializing in innovative stem cell treatments. Located in Playa Del Carmen, Mexico, offering a multi-specialty approach to address various conditions including autism.

name: Juventa Regenerative Medicine
description: Certified expertmedicals at the clinic provide exceptional healing services in orthopedics, endocrinology, and immunology, enhancing treatment success rates. Stem cell therapy offered for autism treatment, promoting healing and restoration with minimally invasive methods. 500 patients annually choose the clinic for top-quality care, indicating trust and satisfaction in their services. Frequent visits from patients in Europe, Commonwealth, Arab League States, USA, Canada, and Australia reflect international recognition. Home medical services tailored to individual needs ensure comfort and personalized care for every patient.

name: Child Development Center Beit Issie Shapiro
description: Israeli rehabilitation center for the children  Beit Izzy Shapiro has been around for 35 years and during that time the unique methods of therapy have been developed in the center, which are used in rehabilitation throughout the world. Beit Izzy Shapiro takes care of children up to 14 years with various developmental disabilities. More than 30 thousand patients a year undergo rehabilitation here.

name: SJD Barcelona Children’s Hospital
description: Ranked among the Top-5 medical institutions in Europe; recognized for expertise in pediatric healthcare. Accredited by the National Board of Health in Spain; part of the National Association of Children’s Hospitals. Comprehensive care for patients from infant age to 21; over 225,000 outpatient visits annually. Specialists develop innovative therapeutic methods; 11 scientific discoveries in molecular medicine. Therapy through play as part of autism treatment; creating a comforting environment for children.

name: Quironsalud Madrid
description: Recognized in the World's Best Hospitals 2021 by Newsweek for its outstanding medical services, including autism treatment. Offers clinical trials for neurodegenerative disorders, providing an opportunity for free treatment if eligible. Features a Neurosurgery Department using advanced neuronavigation for precise interventions, beneficial for autism-related issues. Located in a quiet suburb of Madrid, providing a peaceful environment for patients and families. All patients stay in single, well-equipped rooms with modern amenities for comfort and privacy.
